TextView.android:text: 1. W in the Body of a Word When the w sound appears in the middle of a word, such as in quick, it is indicated by a short dash beneath the vowel after the w sound. This dash is added once the rest of the outline has been completed.
2 Ted The combination ‘ted’ is depicted by merging the letters ‘t’ and ‘d’ into a single long upward line..
3 Ded, Dit, Det The extended stroke symbolizing ted also symbolizes ded and the comparable sounds of dit and det.
• Notice that the d indicating the past tense in audited is linked to dit with a jog..
